allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "[System.Reflection.Assembly]::LoadFile\(''C:\\Users\\Håkan\\AppData\\Roaming\\Emby-Server\\system\\MediaBrowser.Controller.dll''\).GetTypes\(\) | Where-Object { $_.Name -like ''*Playlist*'' } | ForEach-Object { Write-Host ''Class:'' $_.Name; Write-Host ''Methods:''; $_.GetMethods\([System.Reflection.BindingFlags]::Public -bor [System.Reflection.BindingFlags]::Instance -bor [System.Reflection.BindingFlags]::Static\) | ForEach-Object { Write-Host ''  '' + $_.Name } }")
